data.text: Nɛ̀i gè ga Pɔle, nà ga Yesu Kilista ná-keelai, GALA ziimai maaʋele ma, gá ade-ɠɛɛloin Timɔte, gá wo luʋɔsu, wɔi wo GALA ná-Egilisii zu Kolɛnte taazuʋɛ, wa GALA ná-nuiti pɛ ti Akayi yooi zu ná pɛ.
Ade-Ɠɛɛ GALA ta de-Maliɠii Yesu Kilista ti zaalai la wo ma, ti ziilɛigi ve wo ʋɛ.
Mamagi ɠa de-Maliɠii Yesu Kilista Kɛɛɠɛ GALA bɛ, maawɔinɠai pɛ ma Ɠɛɛɠɛi, ta iɲɔdɔɔi pɛ ma ƓALAGI,
nii é gi iɲɔdɔɔzu kidaaʋiligi pɛ su, naa ɠa a kɛ, iɲɔdɔɔi gá ɓɔɠɔi gi sɔlɔɔsu GALA zea, gi zoo gi naati iɲɔdɔɔ, niiti ta ɠɛ kidaaʋiligi ma zii tanɔpɛ su.
Mazɔlɔɔ ʋelei gi ʋɔɔpɛɛzu la Kilista ná-kpɔlɔ wolaiti ba, zenɔ ɠana gi iɲɔdɔɔ wolai zɔlɔɔsu da Kilista ya.
Ni gá ɠɛna kidaaʋiligi zu, naa ɠa ga wo iɲɔdɔɔi ta kizogi zɔlɔɔ. Gá iɲɔdɔɔi zɔlɔɔna, naa ɠa ga wo iɲɔdɔɔi zɔlɔɔ, nii a zobo fe wo ʋɛ, wo ziɛ naama ɓɔlɔi ma ziiti bu, niiti ti zeizu gi ma.
Naa ɠa é ba, gi ɠitogɛ wo ʋa kpaan, mazɔlɔɔ gi kwɛɛ gi ɠɛ, ʋelei wo ʋɔɔpɛɛzu la gá-ɓɔlɔiti ba, zenɔ ɠana wo ʋɔɔpɛɛzu la gá-iɲɔdɔɔi ʋa, nii gi sɔlɔɔsu.
Mazɔlɔɔ kɛ̀ɛleaiti, gi la wɔinni ga wo yɛ gá-ɠidaaʋiligi ɠwɛɛtalai zu, é zeelini gi ma Azi yooi zu. É wuini gi ma gola, é ɓudɛ gi-zɛbɛi ɓelagi maazu, gi-ɠi ge la mɔ ɠɛni gi-yɛnvui ʋolu pɛ.
Gi laani da ga saai ɠɛni niina leveni gi ma ga ɠite. Naa zeelini gi ma, naa ɠa a kɛ, gi mina la ɓɔɠɔ la, kɛni gi la GALA da, é gɔvɛiti fuluzu su, é ti wuzeɠe.
Tɔun ka é gi ɠizoni saai naa ma zii ma, toɠa gi ɠizo ma ʋolu. Gaamazu, gi ɠitogɛ ba ga toɠa gi ɠizosu ma ʋolu.
Wa ɓɔɠɔi ɓalaa wo ɓɔni gi ʋa ga GALA falii. Naa ma, GALA ka nuɓusɛ mɔinmɔingi naati ta-ƓALA falii ɠaaʋote gi ʋɛ, é zaalai la gi ma, ma mɔinmɔin ge ɗa mama gá-vaa zu.

Nii gá zoo ɓɔɠɔ maamusɛzu la, naa ɠa é ga gá-ɠisiɛi ɠa ɓɔɛzu gi ʋɔ ga gá ziɛzu eteai zu, ta wa ɓɔɠɔɓɔɠɔgi wo letemazu, ga ɲadedai ta sɔɓelamalai, niiti ti zeɠezu GALA pɔ, GALA ná-zaalai ɠa é losu gi luɠɔ, é la ga eteai ná-ɠimalai.
Gá-zɛʋɛiti su, gi la faa ɠili sɛʋɛzu, gi ʋa teʋe wo ma, kɛni nii wo kalasu, wo ɗa gaaɠa. Nà ɠisiɛzu ga wa kwɛɛ ga pagɔ,
eɠɛʋelei wo tago ɠaaɠaa la niizu, ga Maliɠii Yesu ná-foloi, gá ɠɛ ga wa-ɓɔɠɔ maamusɛi ma ungi, eɠɛʋelei wo la ga gɔnɔi.
Gè laani naa la, naa ɠa gè deveni la ga mɔunpa gè li dɛ wo ʋɔ bɛ, naa ɠa a kɛ wo tɔnɔgi zɔlɔɔ daa ɠɛ fele.
Gè deveni ga gè ʋa wo ʋɔ bɛ, gè leʋe, gè li Masedoane. Nà ɠalena ma, gè wo ɠa, wa ɓɔ bà gè zeeli Zudé yooi zu.
Siɛgi zu gè naa leveni la, wooʋalada vaa ɠana gè kɛɛni ɓaa? Ɓaa nà-deveiti ti ɠɛa ga nuɓusɛ leveiti, gè ʋa ɗa ɠɛ ma: «Ungo,» naa ʋolu «Ɓa-o»?
Gaama ʋe ga GALA ka ga wooɠɛɠila GALAGI, wooi gi daazeelini wo ma, é la ɠɛni ɠɛɛni ga «ungo, ɓaagi».
Mazɔlɔɔ GALA Doun Zunui Yesu Kilista, nii gi ná-fai laazeelini wo ma, nɔ̀un nà-o, Silase-o, Timɔte-o, é la ɠɛni ɠɛɛni ga «ungo, ɓaagi». Kɛlɛ tɔun zea, ti pɛ ti ɠɛni ga «ungoi».
Mazɔlɔɔ GALA ná-minazeɠegi pɛ daazeeliʋɛ ga Yesu maaʋele. Deɠɛmu da bosu ga tɔun maaʋele ga «amina», nii a kɛ lɛbiyai ve GALA bɛ.
Gi ʋɛɛ wo ʋa, GALA ka é ade ɠiliai Kilista ʋa kpe, é yiimazeɠe ga adeye.
GALA ka é yeeʋogi ʋilɛgai ade ʋa, ga de ɠɛ ga nɔnɔiti, é ná-Zɛnvu Ɲadegai ʋu ade-yiimaʋɛti ga faanɛɛiti ti ʋaazu naati ma ʋoogi.
Kɛlɛ GALA ka ga nà-zeelei, ga wo maazasa faa ɠa é kɛa, gè la mɔ ɠaleni ma la Kolɛnte.
Ma zobo ge la gi ya ga gi zei wa-ɠidaaleʋei unda, kɛlɛ gá pɔ ade botii ɠɛ ʋɔɔma, é ɠɛ ga wa-ɠoozunɛɛi, tɔɔzei wa loni kpaan kidaaleʋei zu.
